description.en-US: Scryfall Enhancer adds helpful features to the Sryfall card search experience. In version 0.1, it introduces a copy (📋) button that lets you copy all card names from your search results to your clipboard, using the Scryfall API behind the scenes. Future versions will include more enhancements and potentially integrations with platforms like Cardmarket. Got ideas? Open a suggestion on Github!

summary.en-US: Enhance your Scryfall experience... at instant speed! 🧙‍♂️
